description.title: What is CTC to Take Home Salary?
description.description: Cost to Company (CTC) is the total amount of money a company spends on an employee annually. It includes both direct benefits (like basic salary) and indirect benefits. Take home salary is what you actually receive in your bank account after all deductions from your CTC.
